overview: When Jules Jordan gets his hands on beautiful specimens like these here, some serious testing is sure to follow. It's all very scientific, mind you. Cali Marie and Cherish is a couple of slutty twins who take care of Jules together. That's teamwork! We've also got perfectly perverse Christie Lee and flawless Sabrine Maui, plus four other babes who are eminently worthy of, uh... study.
title: Perfect Specimens 2
